name: Flex Rabbit
description:
The Story starts off as Flex get hunted and chased for their life. After gaining stretching powers from a glowing carrot from a cave, Flex gains the sudden curiosity to check out the green explosion that had taken place far away.

Flex Rabbit is a game where you play through several chapters as you platform and use your new stretching powers to get through to the end.

This is a project that I have worked on years ago since high-school (started in 2013) and I am currently working on a improved version built on-top of this one.
